title: Grey Loading screen
body: I was trying to play an aram match but when I started to load in my screen turned grey. I tried restarting multiple times and checked for updates but nothing. Is there any fix for this?

replies.body: Grey as in like a "program stopped responding" error? Let's run a quick repair through the game client options and check for any possible driver updates you might have missed to cover the basics first. Be sure to check out the steps in this [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) as well for some more basic troubleshooting and let me know how that goes.
